title: lOTa pATa
sahitya:
lOTa pATa samsAra EnaNNa lOTa pATa samsAradoLage 
siluki nA viTTala ninna dhyAnava maratenayya


caraNam 1    huTTidda munce hasiveyanariye koTTigeyoLage eNTu Aneya kaNDe
maneya oLage Elu kudureya kaNDe killeyoLage Elu caraNava kaNDe
    caraNam 2    yAtada mEle hOta mEvuda kaNDe mAtanADuva gubbiya kaNDe 
rAjyavanALuva cinnANe kaNDe rekkeyillade hArva pakSiya kaNDe
    caraNam 3    kILukoDeyoLobba agasAla sattare mElu koDeyoLabba agasadi aLuvaLu 
avanigU avanigU sambandhavEnendu adu nODi nagutippa purandara viTTala
